message:
The parent circuit breaker has tripped: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/circuit-breaker.html

Circuit breakers are designed to deal with situations when request processing needs more memory than available. 
What caused this error? Was this a one-time query that we should modify, or one that we run frequently?

We might need to increase the size of our ES cluster.

@slack-incidents-emp-integ-analytics
name: [Marketplace Interactions] Elasticsearch Memory: Parent Circuit Breaker
